About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

Hello, my name is Reza and I am a game developer. I'm PhD student of biomedical engineering at Isfahan university medical sciences. I'm the director of game and treatment lab of Isfahan university medical sciences. I have signal processing and pattern recognition background because of that I'm familiar with many machine learning approaches here is my google scholar page you can visit my recent papers.
I have a strong perseverance for learning new things and taking on challenges, and I always like to put some extra time to learn and teach new things, to make sure the creative vision is achieved in the best possible way.I love to create new things because of that I start to learn web development.
In theWork section you can see my projects I've had the opportunity of contributing to, and some of the personal-fun-things I've been working on. If you have any questions please feel free to contact me :)
